Dazed_P.NAME: Dazed (Enigma)
Dazed_P.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

AstralHaze.NAME: Astral Haze
AstralHaze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. The first time each enemy attacks you this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to it.

Starburst.NAME: Starburst
Starburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to the enemy and once to ALL other enemies.

Irradiate.NAME: Irradiate
Irradiate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

EssenceDart.NAME: Essence Dart
EssenceDart.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have an Ethereal card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have an Ethereal card in my hand.

NullStorm.NAME: Null Storm
NullStorm.DESCRIPTION: Recycle a Dazed. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Comet.NAME: Comet
Comet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each other card in your hand.

Retrograde.NAME: Retrograde
Retrograde.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. Exhaust.

Surge.NAME: Surge
Surge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are Weak, Frail, or Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again.

PrismaticSphere.NAME: Prismatic Sphere
PrismaticSphere.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

Flux.NAME: Flux
Flux.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

ArcaneArmor.NAME: Arcane Armor
ArcaneArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Every time you draw this card, increase its Block by !M! for this combat.

Flicker.NAME: Flicker
Flicker.DESCRIPTION: Reverse the effects of Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable on you for !M! turn.
Flicker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reverse the effects of Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable on you for !M! turns.

Nebula.NAME: Nebula
Nebula.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each other card in your hand.

DisruptionField.NAME: Disruption Field
DisruptionField.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Recycle a Dazed.

Hypothesis.NAME: Hypothesis
Hypothesis.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it is Ethereal, draw another card.
Hypothesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it is Ethereal, draw !M! more cards.

Singularity.NAME: Singularity
Singularity.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn gain [E].
Singularity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn gain [E].

Genesis.NAME: Genesis
Genesis.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Exhausted Ethereal card this combat.

Entropy.NAME: Entropy
Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn, increasing by 1 each time you draw this card this combat.
Entropy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn, increasing by 2 each time you draw this card this combat.

PhaseCoil.NAME: Phase Coil
PhaseCoil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Every time you draw this card, increase its damage by !M! for this combat.

PlasmaWave.NAME: Plasma Wave
PlasmaWave.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [E]. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Vulnerable enemies take double damage.

EtherBlast.NAME: Ether Blast
EtherBlast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage, plus !M! damage for ALL of your Ethereal cards.

ForceRipple.NAME: Force Ripple
ForceRipple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. Gain X Weak, X Frail, and X Vulnerable.

SiphonPower.NAME: Siphon Power
SiphonPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Strength.

Syzygy.NAME: Syzygy
Syzygy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Recycle a Dazed. Exhaust.

ThoughtRaze.NAME: Thought Raze
ThoughtRaze.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Ethereal cards in your draw pile. Deal !D! damage for each.

Umbra.NAME: Umbra
Umbra.DESCRIPTION: If you are Vulnerable or Frail, gain !B! Block. NL If you are Weak, deal !D! damage.

GravityWell.NAME: Gravity Well
GravityWell.DESCRIPTION: Receive !M! less damage from attacks for each stack of Weak and Vulnerable the enemy has.

Nexus.NAME: Nexus
Nexus.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Ethereal copy of every non-Ethereal card in your hand into your draw pile.
Nexus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Ethereal copy of every card in your hand into your draw pile.

PeriaptOfCelerity.NAME: Periapt of Celerity
PeriaptOfCelerity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Dexterity.

PeriaptOfPotency.NAME: Periapt of Potency
PeriaptOfPotency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

PowerOverwhelming.NAME: Power Overwhelming
PowerOverwhelming.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Whenever you play an attack, Recycle a Dazed.

Anomaly.NAME: Anomaly
Anomaly.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stack.
Anomaly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stacks.

Vortex.NAME: Vortex
Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full. NL Top-Cycle 4 Dazed. NL Exhaust.

Archives.NAME: Archives
Archives.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every !M! Exhausted cards this combat.

Brainstorm.NAME: Brainstorm
Brainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Top-Cycle a random card. It gains Ethereal and costs 0 until played.

Premonitions.NAME: Premonitions
Premonitions.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 Weak.

Corona.NAME: Corona
Corona.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Whenever you draw this card, increase that amount by 1 this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Whenever you draw this card, increase that amount by 1 this combat.

Equinox.NAME: Equinox
Equinox.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your discard pile is empty or your draw pile is empty. Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My discard pile or my draw pile must be empty.

Experiment.NAME: Experiment
Experiment.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to Debuff you, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Flow.NAME: Flow
Flow.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you've played an Ethereal card this turn. NL Next turn, gain X+1 [E] .
Flow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you've played an Ethereal card this turn. NL Next turn, gain X+2 [E] .

Illuminate.NAME: Illuminate
Illuminate.DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of an Ethereal card in your hand.
Illuminate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of an Ethereal card in your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind Over Matter
MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable. Gain 5 Block, plus !M! Block for each stack removed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not Frail, Weak or Vulnerable.

Overload.NAME: Overload
Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak, 1 Frail, and 1 Vulnerable. Gain [E] [E] [E]. Draw !M! Cards.

Shimmer.NAME: Shimmer
Shimmer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All cards in hand become Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

Convergence.NAME: Convergence
Convergence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When you draw this card, upgrade a card in your hand.
Convergence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When you draw this card, draw another card and upgrade a card in your hand.

SiphonSpeed.NAME: Siphon Speed
SiphonSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

StrokeOfGenius.NAME: Stroke of Genius
StrokeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: Choose to add a random Attack, Skill or Power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Transference.NAME: Transference
Transference.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all of your Weak and Vulnerable to an enemy. Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not Weak or Vulnerable.

Channel.NAME: Channel
Channel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Top-Cycle a card. NL If it is Ethereal, deal !D! more damage.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Vulnerable from an Enemy. It loses !M! HP per stack removed.

MeteorShower.NAME: Meteor Shower
MeteorShower.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Repeat for each Ethereal card. NL Exhaust.
MeteorShower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Repeat for each Ethereal card.

Vacuum.NAME: Vacuum
Vacuum.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. Deal !D! damage, plus !M! damage per stack removed.

ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Recycle a random Ethereal card.
ChaosForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Recycle a random Ethereal card. It costs 0 until played.

Creativity.NAME: Creativity
Creativity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Recycle a Dazed, then draw a card.

Enigma.NAME: Enigma
Enigma.DESCRIPTION: Dazed can now be played to gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Each enemy loses HP equal to the amount of Weak and Vulnerable it has at the start of its turn.

Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

DimensionDoor.NAME: Dimension Door
DimensionDoor.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
DimensionDoor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

Echo.NAME: Echo
Echo.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Ethereal card is played twice.
Echo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 Ethereal cards are played twice.

Eclipse_S.NAME: Eclipse
Eclipse_S.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, draw another card.

Eureka.NAME: Eureka!
Eureka.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 Dazed into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

ReflectionWard.NAME: Reflection Ward
ReflectionWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Zenith.NAME: Zenith
Zenith.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Whenever you shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, gain 1 Vulnerable.

Coalescence.NAME: Coalescence
Coalescence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, gain !M! Block for each stack of Frail, Weak, or Vulnerable you have.

Nova.NAME: Nova
Nova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Recycle a Dazed.
